name: ĞÑ€Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ³ĞµĞ´Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ½
ANGOLA LICHESS EVENTS - ASSOCIATION
description:
OrganizaÃ§Ã£o Angola Lichess Events - Association: Historial & Objectivos 

Votos de boa disposiÃ§Ã£o a todos os membros do grupo do WhatsApp Angola Lichess Events.
Minhas Senhoras e meus Senhores.

O grupo foi formado aos 20 de Setembro de 2016, com o objectivo de unir o pessoal do xadrez do Instituto MÃ©dio Normal de EducaÃ§Ã£o (IMNE marista).  Transcorridos alguns anos, o Jovem Hamilton Borges CristÃ³vÃ£o decidiu expandir o grupo para englobar amantes do xadrez, alheios ao IMNE Marista. Com o aumento de praticantes de xadrez, houve a necessidade de unir duas comunidades, a do IMNE Marista e a outra comunidade. Fundou-se entÃ£o o grupo Angola Lichess Events .

Durante os anos 2018 e 2019, Angola Lichess events, realizou vÃ¡rios torneios mensais online, usando a plataforma da internet https://lichess.org/ (sua plataforma tradicional). Estes torneios contavam apenas com a participaÃ§Ã£o, dos atletas da ProvÃ­ncia de Luanda.
Os torneios cuja duraÃ§Ã£o era de uma a duas semanas, eram arbitrados pelo xadrezista Fernando Campos. 

O grupo ganhou mais visibilidade em 2018, com o ingresso dos Mestres Internacionais David Silva e EsperanÃ§a Caxita. O SecretÃ¡rio Geral (Ã¡rbitro nacional) e outros administradores, tÃªm adicionado xadrezistas doutras provÃ­ncias, universidades, amadores, com vistas a massificar o xadrez, aumentar o nÃ­vel competitivo dos atletas, salvaguardando o lazer diante da Pandemia do COVID-19 e nÃ£o sÃ³.

Com vistas a termos uma associaÃ§Ã£o funcional, estamos organizando-nos para traÃ§armos objectivos gerais e especÃ­ficos com metas realistas, tendo como base fundamental utilizaÃ§Ã£o das plataformas online para levar o xadrez as nossas comunidades. NÃ£o descurando a possibilidade da realizaÃ§Ã£o de torneios e eventos presenciais. 

Conforme anunciamos a quando do segundo Circuito de xadrez, formou-se a direcÃ§Ã£o central e as associaÃ§Ãµes Online de forma indicativa, podendo a mesma cessar mandato dentro de 12 ou 24 meses.

name: EUSKAL HERRIA - COMBINADO VASCO NAVARRO ON LINE
description:
Combinado de jugadores Alaveses, Bizkainos, Gipuzkoanos y Navarros para participar en torneos por equipos, como la Batalla por Comunidades y la Bundesliga.

Lurraldeen arteko Lehia eta Bundesliga bezalako txapelketetan parte hartzeko taldea, Araba, Bizkaia, Gipuzkoa eta Nafarroako jokalariz osatua.

---

Garaipenak / Victorias:
https://lichess.org/forum/team-euskal-herria-combinado-vasco-navarro-on-line/garaipenak--victorias

---

Tenemos un grupo de Whatsapp para hablar de ajedrez, SOLO de ajedrez y nada mÃ¡s que de ajedrez. Contacta con @NowInChess si estÃ¡s interesado.

Xakeaz hitz egiteko Whatsapp taldea dugu, XAKEAZ BAINO EZ. Jarri harremanetan @NowInChess -ekin interesatuta bazaude.

name: FundaciÃ³n Bienestar Club Escuela Caballos de Caissa
description:
La FundaciÃ³n Bienestar dentro de sus iniciativas desarrolla el Proyecto Grandes Maestros para propiciar el desarrollo del talento ajedrecista de todos los venezolanos; y lo desarrolla a travÃ©s del CLUB ESCUELA CABALLOS DE CAISSA. 

Este equipo lo conformamos los miembros vinculados al club y fue creado en Honor a la "DIOSA CAISSA"

Los jugadores que integramos este equipo, somos sus "CABALLOS" que honramos su nombre; mostrando nuestro mejor ajedrez obteniendo hermosas y sufridas victorias, logrando triunfos en distintos torneos y competiciones FIDE.

Los 10 mandamientos de "CAISSA"
1.- Preferir al ajedrez sobre los demÃ¡s juegos.
2.- Acatar las leyes y reglamentos del ajedrez.
3.- Apreciar el ajedrez como cultura.
4.- Difundir ampliamente sus virtudes.
5.- Saber ganar con elegancia y perder con gallardÃ­a.
6.- Pensar bien antes de efectuar una jugada.
7.- Respetar al Ã¡rbitro, la organizaciÃ³n y al adversario.
8.- Tratar adecuadamente las piezas, el tablero, la planilla y el reloj de ajedrez.
9.- Retirarse de un torneo solo con causa justificada.
10.- Fomentar la amistad y la solidaridad entre los pueblos a travÃ©s del ajedrez.

name: Lichess Swiss
description:
The official Lichess Swiss team. We organize regular swiss tournaments for all to join.

Daily Schedule (all times CEST)
10 AM: Daily 90s Bullet Swiss (1,5+0)
11 AM: Daily Hyperbullet Swiss (0,5+0)
12 PM: Daily 45s Bullet Swiss (0,75 + 0)
1 PM: Daily Ultrabullet Swiss (0,25+0)
2 PM: Daily Slow Rapid Swiss (10+3)
2.30 PM: Daily Slow Bullet Swiss (2+1)
4 PM: Daily Classical Swiss (30+0)
5 PM: Daily SuperBlitz Swiss (3+0)
7 PM: Daily Blitz Swiss (5+0)
8 PM: Daily Rapid Swiss (10+0)
8 PM: Daily Bullet Swiss (1+0)
11.30PM: Daily Slow Blitz Swiss (5+3)

name: ROMBLON CHESS CLUB
description:
This group is Exclusive For ROMBLOMANON Chess Players only.
ROMBLON located in MIMAROPA Region is the MARBLE Capital of the Philippines. Composed of 7 main Islands (Tablas, Sibuyan, Romblon, Simara, Banton, Sibale & Carabao (Hambil). 
   This Team will be the Battlefield of Romblon Chess Players, whose aim is to produce more Romblon Chess Masters in the future. 
   Inviting all Romblomanon Chess Players worldwide to join this team. ONHAN ka man, ASI ka man, ROMBLOMANON ka man, we are all from Romblon. Let us always be united because in unity there is strength.
   Romblon Chess Club is a non-profit club/organization. We are accepting donations or sponsorship in any amount for our upcoming tournaments. Let us support the Team and show the whole world that we Romblomanons have lots of talents to compete at the world-class level.
  PADAYON ROMBLOMANON!!! 
Thanks to our Sponsors:
-Mayor Dental Clinic
-DILG Dir. James Fadrilan

description:
Lichess team of FIDE Master SchieberSpieler. Join to get notified from future events such as streams, Swiss tourneys or simuls. Every human is welcome, but being unsportsmanlike can end with a bann.

name: World Classicals
description:
This is a brand new team focusing on Classical Chess games! We are open to any rating.

**Being part of this team will automatically add Daily Classical Arenas to your** [Tournaments](https://lichess.org/tournament)**:**

![Lichess Tournaments Page](https://i.imgur.com/GiGmIbi.png)

You have nothing else to do ğŸ˜‰.
---

We are also regularly organizing Classical Chess Team Battles.

If our tournaments attract enough players regularly, we will try to find a few sponsors.

We are always open to any (reasonable!) suggestions to grow and improve our team ğŸš€.

---

âš™ï¸ HOW IT WORKS?

I [created a bot](https://github.com/ivangabriele/world-classicals-bot) automatically generating a Daily Classical Arenas twice a day. For now, these tournaments are split in 2 rating ranges (<1800 and <2200) and last 12h each. You obviously don't have to play for 12h. They last this long so that you can easily play 2 or 3 times whenever you want within the same Arena.

---

âš”ï¸ WEEKLY TEAM BATTLE

If you want to support our team ğŸ’ª, please join our [Weekly Team Battle](https://lichess.org/tournament/lK6uO6HF). This is a tremendous tournament which gathered more than 550 players during its [first edition](https://lichess.org/tournament/cNHWOrIZ)! Whatever your rating is, don't hesitate to participate, because we play chess first to have fun! Don't worry about our ranking ğŸ˜‰.

I know most of you already receive many team messages, so I will be careful about that. If you don't want to receive any message, you can always uncheck the "Subscribe to team messages" switch ğŸ˜Œ.

---

ğŸ“ A LAST NOTE

Building a team takes time and we hope all our new members will accept to show a bit of patience before we can have all our Arenas regularly filled with players ğŸ§˜.

---

ğŸ† TOP TEAM BATTLE MEMBERS

1ï¸âƒ£ [Natasha_Romanoff](https://lichess.org/@/Natasha_Romanoff) with **43pts**
2ï¸âƒ£ [Ivan_Gabriele](https://lichess.org/@/Ivan_Gabriele) with **24pts**
3ï¸âƒ£ [itchyScorpion](https://lichess.org/@/itchyScorpion) with **8pts**
4ï¸âƒ£ [ALTER-E-GO](https://lichess.org/@/ALTER-E-GO) with **4pts**
5ï¸âƒ£ [TheProKnightChess](https://lichess.org/@/TheProKnightChess) with **3pts**
